marklogic.body:
Now why in the h e l l are all these people around this mental midget when she is going to the doctor? Where is that DESERT CAMEL? With all the paps (eyes rolling..I mean her photog) where is that DESERT PAPA CAMEL? Is it not suppose to be protecting its own rather than having Julius around all the p h u c k i n g time? That p u n k a $ $ nicca is a joke!Â Bet he is Off writing some n a s t y lyrics that contains b e t c h e s and h o e s! ( oh yeah, he wrote a letter, *hacking Cough* saying he would not use that B t c h word). The NOTHINGS!!!
Oh, but they are so private! GTFOH!!!
